duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, forecast, implement, and identify resource requirements for network systems of moderate-to-high complexity.
Integrate communication architectures, topologies, hardware, software, transmission and signaling links, and protocols into complete network configurations.
Utilize Cisco CTC, Ciena optical platform, Infinera DNA Software, and Visio Software for designing, provisioning, maintaining, troubleshooting, and repairing optical transport equipment.
Create network design diagrams and evaluate new products for network problem resolution.
Participate in network planning, architecture design, and engineering, as well as assist in the development and documentation of technical standards.
Manage assigned projects, create high-level designs and plans for network augments and uplifts, and support the training and development of junior engineers.
Monitor network bandwidth utilization, provide capacity solutions, and support network change requests, including hub collapses, moves, network overlays, and fiber diversification requests.

Responsible for planning capacity solutions, migration plans, and solving Enterprise capacity demands, as well as updating system topology maps and reviewing end-of-life hardware replacement strategies.
Develop migration plans, planning and designing High Level Diagrams, and working with vendors to integrate new technologies and denser solutions into the market.
Improve network efficiencies, consolidate capacities, and reduce hardware footprints, as well as be responsible for budget forecasts for the assigned markets.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, IT, or related field.
